description.value:
Weapon (@UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.ZOyejSDAVAH74Z4u]{Longsword}) - Rare (Requires Attunement)

Longswords, which can be wielded with one or two hands, are the stable melee weapon of military officers and nobles.

A magic weapon like this one has a bonus to attack and damage rolls and deals magical bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage.

You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon.

Attack

It deals Radiant damage instead of Slashing damage and deals an extra 1d8 Radiant damage against Undead.

Action

The blade sheds Bright Light in a 15-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 15 feet (sunlight). As an Action, expand or reduce each radius by 5 feet (min 10 ft., max 30 ft.).

Bonus Action

Summon or dismiss the radiant blade. While active, it functions as a Longsword with the Finesse property; if you are proficient with Longswords or Shortswords, you are proficient with the Sun Blade.

Properties:

&reference[magic weapon], &Reference[Finesse], &Reference[Versatile] (1d10)

Foundry Note

If you are proficient with Shortswords you can manually set the item as proficient.
